answers.answer: Well they will have you start checking your blood sugar with a meter three-four times a day and they should give some guidelines on what to eat. They will most likely have you test you keytones every moving with a strip for a week. Hang in there it can be daunting but it is manageable this is my secin gd baby only gained 12 with my first gd baby(third baby) and I'm still done 5 lb with this on thanks to he diet

I failed mine and have gestational diabetes . I have to test before a meal and an hour after. I have pcos so I knew I had a higher chance of getting it. I now have a material fetal medicine doctor on top of my regular OB to make sire everything goes ok. I eat healthy and walk a lot, my husband has diabetes so we have a great support system. If you do end up with it take care of yourself for the baby :)

Good luck to all.  I have my one hour Monday and already had one in December since I am chubby. Avoid sugar whenever possible.... easier said than done!  Only a few more weeks to go at least!  :) A happy and healthy pregnancy for all!   :)

question: If u fail Your 3 hour glucose tell  what doing to happen after that. Cuz i fail my one hour now they scheduled me for 3 hours one on monday plus my water low i hv to drink a gallon water a day
